Posts.Content: Feb 18, 2010 03:34PM naturallyredd wrote: my onc found "spots" on my liver also - why biopsy something if the onc is pretty sure it is?  dont create anymore pain for yourself.  knowing 100% malignant wasnt worth the biopsy or hours in the mri wasnt worth the time to me when we both knew ultimately what it was.  Just like currently - the biopsy for the new mets to my brain - arent worth the brain surgery to me.
Posts.Title: I'm 3c but I have a question? Billynda Billynda
